headline: 75-year-old fast food chain closing 200 restaurants, fights to survive
summary: When people get more conservative with spending, it hurts restaurants that lack a true following. Some people love chains such as Chipotle, Chick-fil-A, Starbucks, and even McDonald's. They view spending money at those brands as a reasonable indulgence, something they may not truly be able to ...

headline: Bear of the Day: Chipotle Mexican Grill (CMG)
summary: This fast casual restaurant stock is under pressure from slowing traffic, margin declines, and weaker earnings forecasts.

headline: Chipotle: We've Seen This Dip Before, And It's A Buy
summary: The US restaurant network has room to double, and Chipotle is yet to fully tap into its international growth potential. Learn more about CMG stock here.
